name: Jyoti, I really wanted to say something to you today, especially since it is your birthday
greetingText: Many many happy return of the Day
wishText: You deserve all the happiess, but i need to explicitly give you this message of affection, of true feeling, from someone who really admires you a lot.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Be blessed today and always. Be enlightened and enlighten all those around you.
replayText: May your heart overflow with good feelings and may it be filled with many, many happinessess every day.
